Text:
Hi! First - many thanks for your rips!

Did you know there's an error on an old rip of yours? Faith No More's Who Cares a Lot have a missing track... (#6, disc 2). Shame on an excellent album. If you have that record, could you please rip the missing track and share it?

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4317735/Faith_No_More_-_Who_Cares_a_Lot_(Greatest_Hits)_[FLAC]_-_Kitlope

Yeah I'm aware of it actually. I have since re ripped it but haven't uploaded. I'll be putting up a Faith No More discography with the corrected track. Give me a week or two though to get it up.

Kit

Ok A proper rip of Faith No More - Who Cares a Lot has been upped but its within the discography. I deleted the borked FNM torrent. 

The proper one can be found here.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5785017/Faith_No_More_-_Studio_Discography_1982_-_1998_[FLAC]_-_Kitlope
